SELECT ct.uuid,ct.order_name,ct.order_type,ct.content_detail,ct.check_sts,ct.order_uuid FROM content ct where ct.sts = 0
AND ct.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderName},'%')
AND ct.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mobile},'%')
AND ct.order_type = #{orderType}
order by ct.created_time desc
SELECT c.uuid,c.order_uuid,c.order_name,c.order_type,c.user_uuid, c.mobile,c.content_detail,c.check_sts FROM content c where c.sts = 0 and c.uuid = #{uuid}
select cr.resources_url from content_resources cr where cr.content_uuid = #{uuid} and cr.sts = 0 order by cr.created_time desc
select img_url from consult_images where sts = 0 and consult_uuid = #{consultUuid} and img_type = #{imgType}

SELECT c.uuid, c.order_name, c.order_type, c.created_time, c.content_detail, b.working_year, b.user_name , e.title, f.lable_desc, e.model, e.mileage, e.made_time, e.vin, e.fault_desc, e.summary, e.idea_process, e.amt FROM content c LEFT JOIN technician b ON c.user_uuid = b.uuid LEFT JOIN order_case a ON c.order_uuid = a.uuid LEFT JOIN technician_case e on e.uuid=a.case_uuid LEFT JOIN sys_dict f ON e.brand_uuid=f.uuid WHERE c.sts = 0 AND c.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT b.user_name, e.title, e.amt, a.evaluate_sts, g.lable_desc FROM content c LEFT JOIN technician b ON c.user_uuid = b.uuid LEFT JOIN order_case a ON c.order_uuid = a.uuid LEFT JOIN technician_case e ON e.uuid = a.case_uuid LEFT JOIN technician f ON f.uuid = e.technician_uuid LEFT JOIN sys_dict g ON f.state_verification = g.uuid WHERE c.sts = 0 AND c.user_uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT case_uuid FROM order_case WHERE car_owner_uuid = #{uuid} AND sts=0
